医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
根据自我报告的数据低估健康差异对英格兰年度健康调查收集的数据进行的首次分析发现，在自称健康状况“较差”的人中，生活在高度贫困地区的人可能比生活在最贫困地区的人健康状况更差地区。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Underestimating-health-disparities-based-on-self-reported-data.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Underestimating-health-disparities-based-on-self-reported-data.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7dc8111f-002e-4b0d-a360-8c002ca405e9 Wed, 18 Sep 2024 08:02:29 -0400 Underestimating health disparities based on self-reported data
授予 100 万美元赠款，用于探索多发性硬化症的髓磷脂修复机制国家多发性硬化症协会（美国）向 Isabel Pérez-Otaño 博士授予 100 万美元的资助，她是西班牙国家多发性硬化症协会联合中心神经科学研究所 (IN) 神经回路可塑性和重塑实验室的负责人。研究委员会 (CSIC) 和埃尔切米格尔·埃尔南德斯大学 (UMH)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/241-million-grant-awarded-to-explore-myelin-repair-mechanisms-in-multiple-sclerosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/241-million-grant-awarded-to-explore-myelin-repair-mechanisms-in-multiple-sclerosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c52c4fa4-922a-453d-bf55-da2bcacfdb1f Wed, 18 Sep 2024 07:44:21 -0400 $1 million grant awarded to explore myelin repair mechanisms in multiple sclerosis
了解阿尔茨海默病的大脑活动变化β-淀粉样蛋白和 tau 蛋白长期以来一直与阿尔茨海默病有关。这些蛋白质的病理积累会导致患有该疾病的人认知能力下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Understanding-brain-activity-shifts-in-Alzheimere28099s-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Understanding-brain-activity-shifts-in-Alzheimere28099s-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c5c57827-a888-4b9a-bed9-c9d814b0f42f Wed, 18 Sep 2024 07:36:16 -0400 Understanding brain activity shifts in Alzheimer’s disease
合成尼古丁品牌是否遵循 FDA 营销指南？研究发现，Instagram 上 87% 的合成尼古丁电子烟帖子无视 FDA 健康警告要求，强调需要更严格的监管。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Are-synthetic-nicotine-brands-following-FDA-marketing-guidelines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Are-synthetic-nicotine-brands-following-FDA-marketing-guidelines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e31cd77e-2b9b-4352-a542-3f8928c18518 Wed, 18 Sep 2024 07:34:00 -0400 Are synthetic nicotine brands following FDA marketing guidelines?
揭示污染物与心律失常风险之间的联系心律失常是一组扰乱心脏正常节律的疾病，可导致严重的健康并发症，如心力衰竭、中风和猝死。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Uncovering-the-link- Between-pollutants-and-arrythmia-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Uncovering-the-link- Between-pollutants-and-arrythmia-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dfb54a77-037f-4834-b233-62e314513f80 Wed, 18 Sep 2024 07:15:02 -0400 Uncovering the link between pollutants and arrhythmia risk
经历多年问题后，田纳西州试图遏制巴拉德的医院垄断Ballad Health 是一家阿巴拉契亚公司，拥有全国最大的国家批准的医院垄断企业，可能很快就会被要求提高其护理质量，否则将面临被分拆的可能性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Tennessee-tries-to-rein-in-Ballade28099s-hospital-monopoly-after-years-of-problems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Tennessee-tries-to-rein-in-Ballade28099s-hospital-monopoly-after-years-of-problems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2bfb2601-d57e-4320-907b-d86fb704f200 Wed, 18 Sep 2024 06:58:54 -0400 Tennessee tries to rein in Ballad’s hospital monopoly after years of problems
机器学习预警系统减少普通医学科的非姑息性死亡CHARTwatch 的一项研究揭示了其在预测患者病情恶化方面的有效性，从而降低了普通医疗单位的非姑息治疗死亡率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Machine-learning-early-warning-system-reduces-non-palliative-deaths-in-general-medicine-unit.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Machine-learning-early-warning-system-reduces-non-palliative-deaths-in-general-medicine-unit.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d0671f6-2a0f-446c-adb1-650ea528d263 Wed, 18 Sep 2024 06:54:00 -0400 Machine learning early warning system reduces non-palliative deaths in general medicine unit
性少数成年人更有可能因患者与临床医生身份不一致而避免接受护理研究表明，性少数和性别少数成年人更有可能由于与临床医生的身份不一致而避免接受医疗保健，这与歧视有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Sexual-minority-adults-more-likely-to-avoid-care-on-the-basis-of-病人-clinician-identity-discordance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Sexual-minority-adults-more-likely-to-avoid-care-on-the-basis-of-病人-clinician-identity-discordance.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7a71f625-832d-428f-b196-263b235587cd Wed, 18 Sep 2024 06:20:00 -0400 Sexual minority adults more likely to avoid care on the basis of patient-clinician identity discordance
氧化应激、肠道和饮食对注意力缺陷多动障碍病理生理学的影响氧化应激和肠道微生物组的相互作用是多动症发病机制的关键，饮食在控制症状和改善结果方面发挥着至关重要的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Impact-of-oxidative-stress-gut-and-diet-on-attention-deficit-hyperactivity-disorder-pathophysiology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Impact-of-oxygenative-stress-gut-and-diet-on-attention-deficit-hyperactivity-disorder-pathophysiology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b546b780-4c3a-437d-9cc7-a2e1e84b904e Wed, 18 Sep 2024 06:14:00 -0400 Impact of oxidative stress, gut, and diet on attention deficit hyperactivity disorder pathophysiology
PlaqueTec 和 RxCelerate 合作开发治疗冠状动脉疾病的早期药物PlaqueTec 是一家识别内型特异性生物标志物以推进冠状动脉疾病 (CAD) 精准医学的公司，与国际领先的外包药物发现和开发服务提供商 RxCelerate 今天宣布成功完成一项合作，以评估所识别的小分子来自 RxCelerate 开发的基于 PlaqueTec 在试点研究中发现的靶点之一的定制细胞测定中的初始化学信息学药物筛选。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/PlaqueTec-and-RxCelerate-collaborate-on-early-phase-drug-discovery-for-coronary-artery-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/PlaqueTec-and-RxCelerate-collaborate-on-early-phase-drug-discovery-for-coronary-artery-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4888c1e2-7810-4b70-aeca-b8f95f4708cd Wed, 18 Sep 2024 05:29:00 -0400 PlaqueTec and RxCelerate collaborate on early phase drug discovery for coronary artery disease
